                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন শর্তে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="width: 8.832em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.23em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.19em, 2.424em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">ax^2+bx+c=0</script></span>&nbsp;এর মূল দুইটির মান সমান কিন্তু বিপরীত চিহ্নযুক্ত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মূলদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="width: 14.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1011.48em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-100"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-111"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-117"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\alpha,\ -\alpha; \alpha+\left(-\alpha\right)=-\frac{b}{a}\therefore b=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>7&nbsp;এর অনুরাশি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন শর্তটি সঠিক হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="width: 16.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.415em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1013.38em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-191"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-193"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-200"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">2x^2-2\left(a+d\right)x+a^2+d^2=0 </script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণটির মূলদ্বয় বাস্তব সংখ্যা হবে?</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="width: 2.917em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.37em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.37em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-227"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.276em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20"> a=d </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>.2</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">D=\left\{-2\left(a+d\right)\right\}^2-4\left(a^2+d^2\right).2 \\ =4\left(a^2+d^2\right)+8ad-8\left(a^2+d^2\right)=-4\left(a-d\right)^2 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-308"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;বাস্তব সংখ্যার ক্ষেত্রে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>&amp;#x2265;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.17em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-311"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≥</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">D\geq0 </script></span></p>

<p>এখানে&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>&amp;#x226F;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1002.17em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-316"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">≯</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>≯</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">D\ngtr 0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="width: 11.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.18em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-321"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-325"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-326"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-328"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\therefore-4\left(a-d\right)^2=0\therefore a=d</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.69em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-395"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">0,\ 0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="width: 15.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1012.62em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-401"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-402"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-413"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-420"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">x^2-3x+2=\left(x-2\right)\left(x-1\right)\therefore2,\ 1 </script></span>&nbsp;দুটি মূল।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><msup><mn>.2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="width: 25.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1020.82em, 5.822em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-431"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1020.82em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-473"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><msup><mn>.2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">2^4-p.2^2+q=0\Rightarrow16-4p+q=0\cdots\cdots\cdots(i) \\
	1-p+q=0\cdots\cdots\cdots\ \left(ii\right)\ ;\   
</script></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Cambria Math&quot;,serif"><m:r><m:rpr><m:scr m:val="roman"><m:sty m:val="p"></m:sty></m:scr></m:rpr>Solving&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0026;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="width: 12.051em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.8em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-481"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-482"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&amp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-491"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-498"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-507"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">&amp;</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\left(i\right)\ \&\ \left(ii\right)\Rightarrow\left(p,\ q\right)\equiv\left(5,\ 4\right)</script></span></m:r></span></span></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>ω</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\left|\begin{matrix}1&-\omega&\omega^2\\-\omega&\omega^2&1\\\omega^2&1&-\omega\\\end{matrix}\right|=1\times\left(-\omega^3-1\right)+\omega\left(\omega^2-\omega^2\right)+\omega^2\left(-\omega-\omega^4\right)    \\
=1\times\left(-2\right)+\omega^3\times\left(0\right)+\omega^3\times\left(-2\right)=-4     
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="width: 21.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1017.3em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-733"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-735"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-736"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-738"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-746" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-748"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-756" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-757" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-758" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-761" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">4\left(k+2\right)^2+4\left(k-4\right)=0;k^2+4k+4+k-4=0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>t</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-770" style="width: 20.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.477em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1016.44em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-771"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-772"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>t</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">k^2+5k=0\therefore k=0,\ -5;\ but\ k\neq0\therefore k=-5 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-1008"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1009"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">]</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.232em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.503em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>9</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>17</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>17</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">A= \left[  \begin{matrix}  1 & 2 \\ 4 & -3    \end{matrix}\right] \Rightarrow A^2=  \left[  \begin{matrix}  9 & -4 \\ -8 & 17   \end{matrix}\right] \\
\therefore A^2+2A-11I=  \left[   \begin{matrix} 9+2-11 & -4+4 \\
   -8+8 & 17-6-11    \end{matrix}   \right]   = \left[ \begin{matrix}   0 & 0 \\ 0& 0  \end{matrix}   \right]</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>A&nbsp;বর্গ ম্যাট্রিক্স হয় এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="width: 3.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.144em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1003.1em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1037"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1038"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\left|A\right|=0 </script></span>&nbsp;হয়</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>A matrix এর বিপরীত matrix&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="width: 1.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.39em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1045"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1046"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1047" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1048"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1049"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">A^{-1} </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করা যাবে যদি A&nbsp;বর্গ ম্যাট্রিক্স হয় এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.54em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1053"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1055"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1058"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1059"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">|A|\neq0</script></span>&nbsp;হয়। কারণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>j</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="width: 5.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.223em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1004.22em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1064"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1065"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1067"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1068"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-size: 70.7%; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.72em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1073"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1074" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1075" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1076" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">j</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1000.82em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1079"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>j</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">A^{-1}=\frac{adj\ A}{\left|A\right|} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="width: 8.981em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.342em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.3em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1084"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1086"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">3x^2+7x-2=0 </script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণের মূল দুইটির যোগফল ও গুণফলের সমষ্টি কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="width: 0.913em; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block;
