</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="width: 24.674em; top: -2.826em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1116"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1151" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1153"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1154"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1155" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1158" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1159" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\alpha+\beta=\frac{-7}{3};\ \ \alpha\beta=\frac{-2}{3}\ \therefore\left(\alpha+\beta\right)+\alpha\beta=-\left(\frac{7+2}{3}\right)=-3</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>

overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1002.46em, 1.157em, -999.998em); clip: rect(3.392em, 1002.35em, 4.249em, -999.998em); top: -3.612em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.153em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1205"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="width: 6.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.45em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1233"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1234"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">x^3+qx+r=0 </script></span>&nbsp;এর মূলগুলো&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.36em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1245"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>β</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\alpha,\beta</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="width: 0.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1000.45em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1250"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.69em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.691em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1346" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1347" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.26em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1348"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1351"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1352" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1353"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.46em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.461em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1358" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1360"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">	\frac{1}{\alpha+\beta-\gamma}+\frac{1}{\beta+\gamma-\alpha}+\frac{1}{\gamma+\alpha-\beta} =\frac{1}{-2\gamma}+\frac{1}{-2\alpha}+\frac{1}{-2\beta} =\frac{\alpha\beta+\beta\gamma+\gamma\alpha}{-2\alpha\beta\gamma} =\frac{q}{-2\left(-r\right)}=\frac{q}{2r}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>

padding-left: 0.184em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">
2+4i,\ 2-4i	
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

padding-left: 0.207em;">13</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>17</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>13</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>13</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">x^3-5x^2+17x-13=0\Rightarrow x^3-x^2-4x^2+4x+13x-13=0 \\
 \Rightarrow x^2\left(x-1\right)-4x\left(x-1\right)+13\left(x-1\right)=0 \Rightarrow\left(x-1\right)\left(x^2-4x+13\right)=0    </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4.13</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="width: 18.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.961em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1014.92em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1524"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1525" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1526" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1531"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.141em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1004.02em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.006em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1532"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1535"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.5em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1536"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1539" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4.13</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.5em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.14em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.141em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1545"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.48em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1546"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1547" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1549" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1550" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1551" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1555" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1561" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mn>16</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4.13</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\therefore x=1,\ \frac{4\pm\sqrt{16-4.13}}{2}=1,\ \frac{4\pm6i}{2}=1^\ ,\ 2\pm3i </script></span>&nbsp;or, Use calculator.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1612" style="width: 0.64em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.503em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1000.41em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1613"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">
1 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ট্রেস ম্যাট্রিক্স&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="width: 12.912em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1622" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="width: 9.019em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="width: 19.469em; <p><strong>Alternate:</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="width: 5.33em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1767"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণেয় সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="width: 31.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 26.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1026.11em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1770"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1771"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1777"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1815" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1819" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">x^2-\left(-\alpha-\beta\right)x+\left(-\alpha\right)\left(-\beta\right)=0\Rightarrow x^2-\frac{2}{3}x+2=0\Rightarrow3x^2-2x+6=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>A,&nbsp;B&nbsp;এবং C&nbsp;ম্যাট্রিক্সগুলোর মাত্রা যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="width: 6.298em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="width: 2.735em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.234em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.19em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1867"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">5\times4	</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1871" style="width: 1.314em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1894" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1895"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1896" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="width: 5.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.18em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1898"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1899"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1901"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1902"><span style="display: inline-block;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>k&nbsp;এর মান কত হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1914" style="width: 12.222em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.024em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1009.99em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1915"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1916"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1917" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1918" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1920" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1922"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1923" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">7</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1927" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.151em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1929" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">27</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">x^2-\left(k+7\right)x+27=0 </script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণের একটি মূল অপরটির তিনগুণ হবে?</p>

                                        </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>20</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1937" style="width: 2.416em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.96em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.91em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1938"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1939" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1940" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1941" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">20</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>20</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1942" style="width: 1.778em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.459em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.41em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1943"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1944" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">5,9</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group StudentAns" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>19</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1947" style="width: 3.372em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.735em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.69em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1948"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">19</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">
5,-19 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, মূলদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1953" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.97em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1954"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1955" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1959" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\alpha,\ 3\alpha </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1960" style="width: 7.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1006.23em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1961"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1963"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">27</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">3\alpha^2=27, \alpha=\pm3 </script></span></p>

<p>এবং</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="width: 11.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1009.59em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1974"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="width: 2.502em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-129">\alpha=3 </script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="width: 2.42em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যে কোন ম্যাট্রিক্স A&nbsp;ও অভেদক ম্যাট্রিক্স&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>I</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="width: 0.635em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.523em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1000.52em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2013"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>I</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-133">I</script></span>&nbsp;এর জন্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>I</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="width: 11.515em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1009.43em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2016"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2017"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.716em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2019"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2020"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2021" style="font-size: 70.7%; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2105" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2106" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2109"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2110" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2114" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2117" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.798em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>I</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>A</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-140">A^{-1}=2A-3A^2-5I\Rightarrow I=2A^2-3A^3-5A \\ \therefore 3A^3-2A^2+5A+2I=0+I=I </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-143-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>P</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2184" style="width: 10.248em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
