overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>P</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>P</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msubsup><mi>c</mi><mn>1</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><msubsup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-146">\left|\begin{matrix}1&1&1\\1&P&P^2\\1&P^2&P^4\\\end{matrix}\right|=\left|\begin{matrix}0&0&1\\1-P&P-P^2&P^2\\1-P^2&P^2-P^4&P^4\\\end{matrix}\right|\ [c_1^\prime=c_1-c_2,c_2^\prime=c_2-c_3]</script></span></p>

overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.641em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 7.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>P</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-147">= P(1-P)(1-P)\ \left|\begin{matrix}0&0&1\\1&1&P^2\\1+P&P(1+P)&P^4\\\end{matrix}\right|\\
=P\left(1-P\right)^2\left(P+P^2-1-P\right)=P\left(P-1\right)^2(P^2-1) </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (16)</h2>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>a</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2481" style="width: 14.018em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2482"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2483" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2485" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2509" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2510" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2512" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2513" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>a</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">V=\frac{1}{4\pi\in_0a\sqrt2}\left(q_A+q_B+q_C+q_D\right)</script></span>;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2516" style="width: 2.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.13em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2517"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2518" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-154">V=0</script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2521" style="width: 21.846em; </span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>যেহেতু প্রথম শোলার বলটি “শূন্যে ঝুলে” আছে, তাই এটি সাম্যাবস্থায় রয়েছে এবং এর উপর মোট বল&nbsp;(Force)&nbsp;শূন্য।</p>

<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 198px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mi>o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2583" style="width: 19.633em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2682"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2683"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2684" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2685" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2686" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.67</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>6.53</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-159">\Rightarrow9\times{10}^9\times\frac{6.67\times{10}^{-9}\times6.53\times{10}^{-9}}{d^2}=0.1\times{10}^{-3}\times9.8\ \Rightarrow d=2\times{10}^{-2}m</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>m&nbsp;ভরের একটি পানির ফোঁটা একটি মাত্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-161-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2692" style="width: 1.343em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-165-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>e</mi><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2717" style="width: 9.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.38em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2718"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2719" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2720" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2722" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2723" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2725" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2727" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.95em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2728"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2729" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2730" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2731" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>e</mi><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-165">mg=eE\Rightarrow E=\frac{mg}{e} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 160px; height: 94px;"></p>

<p>A ও B&nbsp;বিন্দুর মধ্যে তুল্য ধারকত্ব কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>F</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>7</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>21</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2757" style="width: 23.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1018.94em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2758"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2759"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2760" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2761"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2762"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2763" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2766" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.207em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1004.1em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2767"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2768" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2769"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2770"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2771" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2772" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2774" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2775" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2818" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2819"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2820" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2821" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2822" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>F</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>7</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>21</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-170">C_{eq}=\left(\frac{1}{F}+\frac{1}{2F}\right)^{-1}+\left(\frac{1}{3F}+\frac{1}{4F}\right)^{-1}
	=\frac{2F}{3}+\frac{12F}{7}=\frac{50F}{21}  
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 25 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ধারক প্রতি সেকেন্ডে অর্ধেক চার্জ হারায়। যদি ধারকটিতে চার্জ হারানো শুরুর&nbsp;5&nbsp;সেকেন্ড পর q&nbsp;একক চার্জ অবশিষ্ট থাকে তবে প্রাথমিক চার্জ কত ছিল?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-175-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2839" style="width: 15.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.62em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2840"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2841"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2842" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2845" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.48em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2846"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2847" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2848"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 1.641em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2855"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2857" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2859" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2860" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2861" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2863" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2867" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">32</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-175">q_n=\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^n.\ q_0\Rightarrow q_0=2^5\times q=32\ q </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 26 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের পাতদ্বয়ের মাঝখানে 5&nbsp;তড়িৎ মাধ্যমাঙ্কের পরাবৈদ্যুতিক মাধ্যম স্থাপন করা হলে সঞ্চিত শক্তি কত গুণ হবে? [উভয়ক্ষেত্রে পাতদ্বয়ে সঞ্চিত আধানের পরিমাণ সমান।]</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2886" style="width: 12.051em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2887"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2888"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">U<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2890" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; <p>Now,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-181-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0026;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2918" style="width: 17.953em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-182-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.633em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mfrac><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-182">\Rightarrow V_2=\frac{V_1C_1}{C_2}=\frac{V_1C_1}{kC_1}=\frac{V_1}{k} \\
\therefore U_2=\frac{1}{2}kC_1\frac{V_1^2}{k^2}=\frac{1}{k}\times U_1\Rightarrow\frac{U_2}{U_1}=\frac{1}{k}=\frac{1}{5}  
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 27 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 104px;"></p>

<p>চিত্রের সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের পাতদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব&nbsp;20 mm&nbsp;ও ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3039" style="width: 3.467em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.833em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.83em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3040"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3043"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3044" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3045" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-183">0.4\ m^2 </script></span>&nbsp;হলে ধারকত্ব কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>t</mi><mi>K</mi></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.854</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.925</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.925</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">A=0.4\ m^2\ ;t=2\times{10}^{-3}\ m\ ;K=5\ ;d=20\times{10}^{-3}\ m \\
C=\frac{\in_0A}{d-t+\frac{t}{K}}=\frac{8.854\times{10}^{-12}\times0.4}{20\ \times\ {10}^{-3}\ -2\times{10}^{-3}+\frac{2\ \times{10}^{-3}}{5}} 
=1.925\times{10}^{-10}\ \ F 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 28 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সমভাবে আহিত দুটি পিথবল বায়ুতে&nbsp;2 mm&nbsp;ব্যবধানে রাখলে পরস্পরকে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3227" style="width: 5.926em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.845em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.85em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3228"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3231" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3232"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3233"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3235"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3236"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3237" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.33</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3289" style="width: 14.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1012.22em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3290"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3291" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3293" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3295" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3296"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3297" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3298" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.482em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3299"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3300" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3301" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3303" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.33</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3307" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3308"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3309"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3311"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3312"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3313" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3314" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3316" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.33</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-194">F=C\times\frac{q^2}{d^2}\Rightarrow q=1.33\times{10}^{-10}\ C </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ব্যাটারির সাথে যুক্ত একটি সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের মধ্যবর্তী স্থানে একটি পরাবৈদ্যুতিক মাধ্যম স্থাপন করা হল। মাধ্যমের পরাবৈদ্যুতিক ধ্রুবক 7&nbsp;হলে সঞ্চিত শক্তি কতগুণ &nbsp;হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3360"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3361" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3363"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3364" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3365" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>;</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>;</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-197">\frac{C_2}{C_1}=k;W_1=\frac{1}{2}C_1V^2;W_2=\frac{1}{2}C_2V^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-198-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3366" style="width: 7.666em;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-203-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3422" style="width: 7.197em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রত্যেক চার্জ হতে মধ্যবিন্দুর দূরত্ব,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-211-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3626" style="width: 3.653em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-213-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3644" style="width: 5.292em; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3647"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3648"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3650" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3652" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3653"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.79em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3655"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3656"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3657" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3658" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-213">{10}^5\ NC^{-1} </script></span>&nbsp;মানের তড়িৎক্ষেত্রের সমান্তরালে থাকলে একে ঘুরিয়ে বিপরীতমুখী করতে কী পরিমাণ কাজ করতে হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তিনটি ধারকের শ্রেণি সংযোগে তুল্য ধারকত্ব&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-219-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3735" style="width: 2.61em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.126em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.13em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3736"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3739" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3740" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-219">1\ \mu F</script></span>&nbsp;। দুইটি ধারকের মান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-220-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3741" style="width: 2.275em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.87em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3742"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3744" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3745" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-220">2\mu F</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-221-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3746" style="width: 2.275em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3808" style="font-size: 70.7%;
