top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3809" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3811" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3812" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3813"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3814" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3815" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3817" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3818" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3819" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3823" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3824" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>P</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-226">\frac{1}{C_P}=\frac{1}{C_1}+\frac{1}{C_2}+\frac{1}{C_3}\Rightarrow1=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{C_3}\Rightarrow C_3=6\ \mu F </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1.5&nbsp;cm&nbsp;ব্যাসার্ধের কোনো গোলাকার পরিবাহীকে এমনভাবে আহিত করা হল যেন এর পৃষ্ঠে বিভব হয়&nbsp;11&nbsp;V&nbsp;। তাহলে এর কেন্দ্রে প্রাবল্য কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.596em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3866"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3867"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3868" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পৃষ্ঠে বিভব = কেন্দ্রে বিভব। তাই প্রাবল্য শূন্য।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (16)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>4°C&nbsp;তাপমাত্রায় বিশুদ্ধ পানির মোলার ঘনমাত্রা কত? [&nbsp;4°C&nbsp;তাপমাত্রায় পানির ঘনত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-231-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3870" style="width: 4.026em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.24em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3871"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3874" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3875"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3876"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3878" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3879" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ঘনমাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-236-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>18.016</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1000</mn><mn>18.016</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>55.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3940" style="width: 19.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1015.95em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3941"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3942" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3943" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.3em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3963" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">18.016</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3964" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3965" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3966" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3967"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3968" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3969"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3970"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3971" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3972" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">55.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3977" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3978" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3979"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3980" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3981"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3982"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3983" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3984" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>18.016</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1000</mn><mn>18.016</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>55.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-236">=\frac{1\times1000}{18.016\ gmol^{-1}}=\frac{1000}{18.016}molL^{-1}=55.5\ molL^{-1}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4042"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4043"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4044" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-244-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8.5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3.16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>l</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4046" style="width: 25.002em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: red">Incorrect</span>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-254-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-255-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4279" style="width: 0.658em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-257-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>3</mn></msubsup></mrow><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mn>21</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>63</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>820.47</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4302" style="width: 21.928em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">820.47</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4371" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4372" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4373"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4374" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.648em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>3</mn></msubsup></mrow><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mn>21</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>63</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>820.47</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-257">\therefore\ K_p=\frac{P_{N_2}\times P_{H_2}^3}{P_{NH_3}^2}=\frac{\frac{21}{100}\times20\times\left(\frac{63}{100}\times20\right)^3}{\left(\frac{16}{100}\times20\right)^2}=820.47\ atm^2 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 38 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>

width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-259">3.5\times{10}^{-4}{\rm molL}^{-1} </script></span>&nbsp;পেতে হলে অ্যাসিটিক এসিডের ঘনমাত্রা কত থাকতে হবে?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-264-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mrow><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mstyle mathsize=&quot;1.44em&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></mstyle></munder><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-265-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mi>c</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>c</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4536" style="width: 15.002em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-266-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>1.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6.806</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4565" style="width: 20.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.699em, 1016.93em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4566"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4567" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4568" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; </span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধি করলে নিচের বিক্রিয়ার জন্য কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.3em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4675"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4676"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4677" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 2.498em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>X</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>Z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>X</mi><msub><mi>Z</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∆</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>k</mi><mi>J</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-267">X_2\left(g\right)+4Z_2\left(g\right) \rightleftharpoons 2XZ_4\left(g\right);\ \ ∆H=+x kJmol^{-1}</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">

<p>এখানে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-279-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4801" style="width: 7.871em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-294-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4.75</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.33</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4940" style="width: 26.314em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1023.03em, 4.387em, -999.998em); position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5053" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5054"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5055"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5056" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5057" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5058" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5059" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.01496</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5062" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5063" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5064" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5066" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5068"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01496</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">96</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5073" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5074" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5075" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.44</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5077" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5078" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>4.75</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1.33</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.01496</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.01496</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.44</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-295">\Rightarrow n_{salt}=0.02\times{10}^{4.75+\log(1.33\times{10}^5)}\\
  \Rightarrow n_{salt}=0.01496mol=\left(0.01496\times96\right)gm=1.44gm </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

                                        </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-301-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>Q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5116" style="width: 5.148em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.192em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1004.19em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5117"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5118"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.414em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 45 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>

                                        </div>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-310-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5354" style="width: 0.658em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5376" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5378" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5379" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5380" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-311">n_{H^+}=0.8\times{10}^{-3}\ mol\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-312-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5382" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5383"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5384" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-312">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবণটি অম্লীয়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>

position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5517" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5518" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.22</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.436em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>≡</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>V</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>≡</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>50</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>50</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.06</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.22</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-315">V\ mL\ \frac{M}{10}\ HCl\equiv\frac{V}{10}\ mL\ 1M\ H^+ \\
V\ mL\ \frac{M}{50}\ HCl\equiv\frac{V}{50}\ mL\ 1M\ H^+ \\
\left[H^+\right]=\frac{\left(\frac{V}{10}+\frac{V}{50}\right)\times1}{2V}=\ \frac{\left(\frac{1}{10}+\frac{1}{50}\right)}{2}=0.06M\  
\therefore pH=\ -\log{\left[H^+\right]}=1.22 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 47 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: red">Incorrect</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সোডিয়াম বাইসালফেট দ্রবণের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-316-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5522" style="width: 2.647em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.163em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.16em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5523"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5524" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5525" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5526" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-316">pOH</script></span>&nbsp;কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-321-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5542" style="width: 4.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.4em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5543"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5544" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5545" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5546" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5547" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5548"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5549" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5550" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-321">NaHSO_4 </script></span>&nbsp;একটি মৃদু এসিডীয় লবণ।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-322-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5551" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5552"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5553" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-322">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;এর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-323-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5554" style="width: 8.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1007.34em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5555"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5556" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5557" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5562" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5563" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5564" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5565" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-323">pH<7\ \ \therefore p OH>7</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 48 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>10K&nbsp;তাপমাত্রায় নিচের কোন বিক্রিয়ার ক্ষেত্রে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-324-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5568" style="width: 5.74em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-325-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CB;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>H</mi><mi>I</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5578" style="width: 13.345em; padding-left: 0.276em;">⇋</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5597" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-329-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5679" style="width: 3.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.67em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5680"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5682" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-329">\Delta n>0 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 49 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>

                <div class="TakeExamHeader">
                    <h2 style="font-size: 25px;font-weight: bolder;color: #000000;">Written</h2>
                </div>
            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1</span>
                                                        <span style="color:red; float:right !important;">Not Answered</span>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-336-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5840" style="width: 8.832em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.23em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.19em, 2.424em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5845" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5847" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;                                             <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5974" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.1em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.548em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-343">\alpha+\beta=-\frac{b}{a}\ \ \ ;\ \alpha\beta=\frac{c}{a} ;  2\left(\alpha+\beta\right)=-\frac{b^2}{a^2}\ \\ \Rightarrow2\left(\alpha+\beta\right)=-\left(\alpha+\beta\right)^2\ \ \Rightarrow\alpha+\beta=-2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-344-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5978" style="width: 17.01em;
