<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-345-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2013;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>;</mo><msup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6013" style="width: 17.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1014.63em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6014"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6015" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6016" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6018" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6019" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6021" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6022" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6024"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6025" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6027" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6030" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6031" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6032" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6033" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-6035" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6036" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6037" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6038" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6039" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-6042"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6043" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6044" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>n</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>–</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>;</mo><msup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-345">n\alpha  +n\beta  = n\left(\alpha +\beta\right)=\ –2n  ; n^2\alpha \beta  = 4n^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-346-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6045" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6046"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6047" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-346">\therefore </script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;সমীকরণ:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-347-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6048" style="width: 8.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1006.85em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6049"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-6050"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6051" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6052" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6055" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6056" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-6059"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6060" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6061" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6063" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-347">x^2+2nx+4n^2=0</script></span>&nbsp;[Showed.]</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-348-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6064" style="width: 5.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.1em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6065"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6066" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6068" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-348">\alpha+\beta=-2</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করতে পারলে ০৩ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-349-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6072" style="width: 3.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.46em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6073"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6074" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6075" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-349">\alpha\beta=4\ </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করতে পারলে ০৩ নম্বর।</p>

<p>সমীকরণটি নির্ণয় করতে পারলে ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

                                            </div>


                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>
                                                        <span style="color:green; font-weight:bold; float:right !important; ">             10/10</span>

4.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>y</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>z</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>z</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>z</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><msubsup><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msubsup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-355">\Rightarrow\left(1+xyz\right)\left|\begin{matrix}1&x&x^2\\1&y&y^2\\1&z&z^2\\\end{matrix}\right|=0 \Rightarrow\left(1+xyz\right)\left|\begin{matrix}0&x-y&x^2-y^2\\0&y-z&y^2-z^2\\1&z&z^2\\\end{matrix}\right|=0\ \left[\begin{matrix}r_1^\prime=r_1-r_2\\r_2^\prime=r_2-r_3\\\end{matrix}\right]  </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-356-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>z</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6515" style="width: 16.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1013.57em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6516"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6518" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6520"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6523" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6524" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6525" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6526" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6527" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6529"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6530" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6532" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6534" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6536"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6537" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6539" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6541" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6543"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6544" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6546" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>z</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-356">\Rightarrow\left(1+xyz\right)\left(x-y\right)\left(y-z\right)\left(z-x\right)=0</script></span></p>

<p>যেহেতু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-357-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mi>z</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-6550" style="width: 12.051em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1009.84em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6551"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6552" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6554" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6556" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-6558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6559" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6560" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-6562"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6565" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6566" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6567" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>≠</mo><mi>z</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-357">x\ne y\ne z,\ \therefore\left(1+xyz\right)=0  </script></span>&nbsp;[Showed.]</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-358-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -1.064em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.814em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>y</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>z</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-358">\left(1+xyz\right)\left|\begin{matrix}1&x&x^2\\1&y&y^2\\1&z&z^2\\\end{matrix}\right|=0</script></span>&nbsp;পর্যন্ত নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p>প্রমাণ করার জন্য ০৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="alert" role="alert" style="width:100% !important; text-align:center; margin-bottom:0px;">
                                                <span class="reviewRequest" style="margin-bottom:10px;" id="">Request for Review</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

=\left[\begin{matrix}3-4+2&-4+2+2&2+0-2\\6-10+4&-8+5+4&4+0-4\\9-14+5&-12+7+5&6+0-5\\\end{matrix}\right] =\left[\begin{matrix}1&0&0\\0&1&0\\0&0&1\\\end{matrix}\right]=I_3; </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-364-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7077" style="width: 7.584em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7078"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7079" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7080" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7084" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7086" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7087" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7088" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-365-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7089" style="width: 3.773em; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7096" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-365">AB=I_3</script></span>;&nbsp;নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-366-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7097" style="width: 3.773em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7098"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7099" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7100" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                             </div>

padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7178" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-370">x^3+qx+r=0  \therefore\alpha+\beta+\gamma=0,\ \ \alpha\beta+\beta\gamma+\gamma\alpha=q</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-371-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7179" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.53em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7180"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7181" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7182" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7183" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7186" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-371">\alpha\beta\gamma=-r</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-372-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7187" style="width: 23.609em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-373-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7234" style="width: 22.912em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-374-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>r</mi></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7273" style="width: 8.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.764em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.76em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7274"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7277" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-7279" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7280"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7281" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7282" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7283" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-7285" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.97em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7286"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7287" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7288" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7289" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7290" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7291" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7292" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.13em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>r</mi></mrow><mi>α</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>r</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow><mi>α</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-374">=-q+\frac{3r}{\alpha}=\frac{3r-q\alpha}{\alpha}  </script></span>&nbsp;[showed.]</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-375-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7293" style="width: 14.715em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1012.05em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7294"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7295" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7297" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7299" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-7303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-7304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7305" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7306" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7308" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7309" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7311" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7312" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7314" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-375">\alpha+\beta+\gamma=0,\ \ \alpha\beta+\beta\gamma+\gamma\alpha=q</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-376-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7315" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.53em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7316"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7317" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7318" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7319" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7322" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-376">\alpha\beta\gamma=-r</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০৩ নম্বর।</p>

<p>প্রমাণ করার জন্য ০৭ নম্বর।</p>

                                            </div>

                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (3)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                                        <span style="color:green; font-weight:bold; float:right !important; ">             10/10</span>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>প্রতিটি 220V এ চার্জিত সমআকারের আটটি ছোট গোলাকার ফোঁটাকে মিলিত করে একটি বড় ফোঁটায় পরিণত করা হলো। বড় ফোঁটার বিভব কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block; border:1px solid solid; padding:0px;">
                                                            <div style="border: 1px solid solid; padding: 0px;">
                                                                <img style="width:100%;" src="https://ums-public-online-written.s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/StudentOnlineWrittenExamImage/39993/1957014_39993_1720063b-7e9a-43c3-a303-238c7ba59961/anno_7_ba0a3626-a7a3-4d7a-827a-aa87e49d00d4.jpg">
                                                            </div>
                                                        </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                                <p>ধরি, প্রতিটি ছোট গোলাকার ফোঁটার চার্জ q</p>

<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-377-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7323" style="width: 18.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1015.08em, 2.543em, -999.998em); clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7344" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7346" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7347" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7348" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7349" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7351" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7354" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7357" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7359" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>8</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>π</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>π</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mo>…</mo><mo>…</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-377">8\times\left(\frac{4}{3}\pi\right)r^3=\left(\frac{4}{3}\pi\right)R^3\Rightarrow R=2r \ldots\ldots\left(i\right)</script></span></p>

<p>We know,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-378-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mi>o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mi>r</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7361" style="width: 5.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.88em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7362"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7363" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-7365" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7366" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.52em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7367"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7368" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7370"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-7374" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.453em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; <p>বড় ফোঁটার বিভব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-379-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-379">V^\prime </script></span>&nbsp;এবং প্রতিটি ছোট ফোঁটার বিভব V&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7421" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>q</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mi>q</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow><mi>q</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-380">\frac{V^\prime}{V}=\frac{q^\prime}{q}\times\left(\frac{r}{R}\right)=\frac{8q}{q}\times\left(\frac{r}{2r}\right)=\frac{8}{2}=4</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-381-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>220</mn><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>880</mn><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7423" style="width: 13.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1011.27em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7424"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7425" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7426" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7427" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7428" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7431" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">220</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7436" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">880</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7439" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>220</mn><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>880</mn><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-381">\therefore V^\prime=4V=4\times220V=880V</script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><b><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-382-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7440" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.46em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7441"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7442" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7445" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-382">R=2r</script></span>;&nbsp;</b>নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-383-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7446" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.46em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7447"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-7448"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7449"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7450" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7451" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7452" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-383">\frac{V^\prime}{V}=4</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-384-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>880</mn><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7455" style="width: 4.797em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7456"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7457"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7458" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7459" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">880</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7462" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>V</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>880</mn><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-384">V^\prime=880V</script></span>;&nbsp;নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><b>[বি:দ্রঃ</b> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                                        <span style="color:green; font-weight:bold; float:right !important; ">             10/10</span>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি শোলা বলের প্রতিটির ওজন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-385-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7463" style="width: 3.653em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.982em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.231em, 1002.98em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7464"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7465"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-7466"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7467"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-7469"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7470"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7471" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7472" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7473" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7474" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-385">{10}^{-3}kg </script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-386-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.8</mn><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7475" style="width: 2.647em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.163em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.13em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7476"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.8</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7478" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.8</mn><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-386">0.8m</script></span>&nbsp;দৈর্ঘ্যের সিল্কের সুতার মাধ্যমে একই বিন্দু থেকে ঝুলানো হয়েছে। এরা সমভাবে চার্জিত ও একে অন্যকে&nbsp;0.04m&nbsp;দূরে বিকর্ষণ করে। প্রতি বলে চার্জ নির্ণয় কর।</p>

                                        </div>
                                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block; border:1px solid solid; padding:0px;">
                                                            <div style="border: 1px solid solid; padding: 0px;">
                                                                <img style="width:100%;" src="https://ums-public-online-written.s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/StudentOnlineWrittenExamImage/39993/1957014_39993_1720063b-7e9a-43c3-a303-238c7ba59961/anno_6_98dcd83f-d520-4a13-87a3-dff2be4c1317.jpg">
                                                            </div>
                                                        </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                                <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 160px; height: 84px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-387-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>T</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>T</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>m</mi></msub><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot;
