xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>T</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>T</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>m</mi></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.04</mn><mi>m</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.8</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.02</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mn>0.02</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>39.99</mn><mo>;</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>m</mi></msub></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>m</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-387">T\sin{\theta}=mg\ ;T\cos{\theta}=F_m \\ r=0.04m;\tan{\theta}=\frac{\sqrt{{0.8}^2-{0.02}^2}}{0.02}=39.99; \tan{\theta}=\frac{mg}{F_m}\\ \Rightarrow F_m=\frac{mg}{\tan{\theta}}\Rightarrow\frac{1}{4\pi\in_0}.\frac{q^2}{r^2}=\frac{mg}{\tan{\theta}}\Rightarrow q^2=\frac{mg\times4\pi\in_0\times r^2}{\tan{\theta}} </script></span></p>

vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.04</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>39.99</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4.36</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>17</mn></mrow></msup><mo>∴</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-388">=\frac{{10}^{-3}\times9.8\times\left(0.04\right)^2}{39.99\times9\times{10}^9}=4.36\times{10}^{-17}\therefore q=6.6\times{10}^{-9}\ C</script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><b><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-389-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>39.99</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7672" style="width: 5.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.674em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.63em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7673"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7675"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-7676" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7677"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7678" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">39.99</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>39.99</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-389">\tan{\theta}=39.99</script></span>;&nbsp;</b>বের করার জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-390-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7681" style="width: 6.928em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7682"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7683"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7684" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7685" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7696" style="font-size: 50%; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-390">q^2=\frac{mg\times4\pi\in_0\times r^2}{\tan{\theta}}</script></span>;&nbsp;বের করার জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-391-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7707" style="width: 7.256em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7708"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7709" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7713" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-7717"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7718"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7719" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-391">q=6.6\times{10}^{-9}\ C</script></span>;&nbsp;নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><b>[বি:দ্রঃ</b> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                            </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7</span>
                                                        <span style="color:green; font-weight:bold; float:right !important; ">             10/10</span>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি বিন্দু&nbsp;A ও B তে সমমানের ও বিপরীত চার্জ রেখে দ্বিমেরু তৈরি করা হলো। AB&nbsp;এর দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-392-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7723" style="width: 3.057em; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-392">10\mu m</script></span>&nbsp;। O, AB&nbsp;এর মধ্যবিন্দু। এর কেন্দ্র O থেকে 12cm দূরে P বিন্দুতে তড়িৎ প্রাবল্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-393-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>700</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>V</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7728" style="width: 5.367em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7729"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">700</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-7731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7732" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.188em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7733"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7734" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-7735"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7736"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7737" style="font-size: 70.7%; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-394-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2220;</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>120</mn><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7739" style="width: 7.602em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.224em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1006.22em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7740"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∠</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7742" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7743" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7744" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7746" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.902em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.46em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">120</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.492em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7748" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">∠</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>120</mn><mi>o</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-394">\angle BOP=120^o</script></span>]&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block; border:1px solid solid; padding:0px;">
                                                            <div style="border: 1px solid solid; padding: 0px;">
                                                                <img style="width:100%;" src="https://ums-public-online-written.s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/StudentOnlineWrittenExamImage/39993/1957014_39993_1720063b-7e9a-43c3-a303-238c7ba59961/anno_5_d17c9c7d-2999-4924-acd9-0a9f850c9743.jpg">
                                                            </div>
                                                        </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>700</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><msup><mn>260</mn><mi>o</mi></msup></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-397">\Rightarrow700=9\times{10}^9\times\frac{q\times10\times{10}^{-6}}{\left(0.12\right)^3}\ \sqrt { 1+3cos260^o}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-398-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.02</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7904" style="width: 9.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.17em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7905"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7907" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.02</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-7911" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-7912"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7913"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-7915"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-7916"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7917" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-7918" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7919" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-7920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.02</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-398">\Rightarrow q=1.02\times{10}^{-5}C\ </script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-399-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>p</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7921" style="width: 11.355em; <p>মান বসানোর জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>ক্যালকুলেশন করে q&nbsp;এর মান বের করার জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><b>[বি:দ্রঃ</b> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (3)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8</span>
                                                        <span style="color:green; font-weight:bold; float:right !important; ">             10/10</span>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-400-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-7952" style="width: 6em;                                         </div>
                                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block; border:1px solid solid; padding:0px;">
                                                            <div style="border: 1px solid solid; padding: 0px;">

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                                <p>ঘটনা-i:</p>

<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 320px; height: 66px;"></p>

<p>ঘটনা-ii:&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 320px; height: 51px;"></p>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8141" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8142" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8143" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-8144"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8145" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8146" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.035em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-8151"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8152" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8153" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">25</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8156" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">32</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>25</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>32</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-408">K_c=\frac{(1+x)x}{(4-x)(2-x)}=4\Rightarrow\frac{x+x^2}{8-6x+x^2}=4 \Rightarrow3x^2-25x+32=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-409-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.75</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1.579</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8161" style="width: 7.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1006.48em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-8162"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8164" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.75</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1.579</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-409">\Rightarrow x=6.75,\ 1.579</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-410-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.579</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8170" style="width: 7.051em; <p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><b><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-412-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8187" style="width: 3.363em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-413-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.579</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8194" style="width: 6.109em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.96em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-8195"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8196" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.579</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-8199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8200" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8201" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8202" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.579</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-413">x=1.579 \ mol </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৬ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি:দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9</span>
                                                        <span style="color:green; font-weight:bold; float:right !important; ">             0/10</span>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রায় ম্যালেইক&nbsp;(Maleic)&nbsp;এসিডের প্রথম বিয়োজন ধ্রুবক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                             <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8395" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1.15</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3.39116</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-419">\therefore\left[H^+\right]_1=\sqrt{1.15\times{10}^{-2}\times0.1}\ molL^{-1}=3.39116\times{10}^{-2}\ molL^{-1} </script></span></p>

<p>আবার,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-420-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>H</mi><msubsup><mi>X</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-421-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><msup><mi>X</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi>H</mi><msup><mi>X</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8429" style="width: 10.617em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.13em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.997em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msup><mi>X</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>H</mi><msup><mi>X</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-421">K_{a_2} = \frac{\left[H^+\right]_2[X^-]}{ [HX^-]} = \frac{\left[H^+\right]_2^2}{\left[H^+\right]_1} </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-423-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>+</mo></msubsup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3.40546</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.46782</mn></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>1.47</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8547" style="width: 25.863em; <p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><b><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-427-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.47</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8711" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.69em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-8712"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8713" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.47</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.47</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-427">pH=1.47</script></span>&nbsp;</b>নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি:দ্র: </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]&nbsp;</p>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8840" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-438-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>7.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8856" style="width: 27.953em; <p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-439-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>O</mi><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></mrow></msup><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>13.9</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mn>7.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.75</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-8916" style="width: 25.002em; <p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-441-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>O</mi><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.75</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-9027" style="width: 12.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1010.45em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-9028"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-9029"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-9030" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-9031"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-9032" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-9033"><span style="display: inline-block; <p>[<strong>বি:দ্র: </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

                                            </div>
